Sentencas: Ceria is used as a sulfur sorbent due to its high affinity for sulfide at high temperatures.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the ionic conductivity of ceria can be dramatically increased by doping with rare metals, including lanthanum, samarium, and gadolinium.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, to enhance sulfur tolerance and improve anode performance, we modified an Ni-based anode with a thin layer coating of Sm0.2Ce0.8O2-delta (SDC) on the pore wall surface of an Ni/YSZ anode.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The anode-supported cells were tested with varying H2S concentrations (0-100 ppm) at 600 and 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell performance was improved in the ceria- (by 20%) and in the SDC- (by 50%) modified anode by extending the additional TPB area in the anode.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Under varying H2S exposure, the polarization resistance was reduced by ceria and the SDC coating on the anode pore wall surface, which led to improved cell performance.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A porous SDC layer on the Ni/YSZ anode pore wall acted as a sulfur sorbent as well as an additional TPB area.
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Otherwise, ceria mainly acted as a sulfur sorbent at high concentrations of H2S (> 60 ppm).
Titulo: Analysis of the regenerative H2S poisoning mechanism in Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-coated Ni/YSZ anodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
